= Install rbenv =

In Ubuntu, just simply call:

{{{bash
sudo apt install rbenv
}}}

For other OS, refer to main [[https://github.com/rbenv/rbenv#installation|docs]]

* To list all availabe ruby version: `rbenv install -l`
* To install ruby version 2.7.1: `rbenv install 2.7.1`
* To use 2.7.1 as default: `rbenv global 2.7.1`
